content.detailedDescription: Between 1997-1999. i was training in petawawa (army base) canada... i was a corporal military police... i was laying prone in my shell scrape covering my arcs of fire... it was approx. 1-3 am overcast in the woods... it was so dark i couldn't see my hand in front of my face... i saw a red light entering my ark coming from my right traveling to my left... at about my 11-12 o'clock position it changed course and floated straight towards me... it was a red floating orb semi transparent that emited little light... i craweled towards it and tried to touch it with my hands... thee red floating semi transparent orb that emited little light backed away out of arms reach... it floated up and down slowly as if it was checking me out... i pulled back my arms and rested them under my chest... i stretched my head as forward as it would go... still in prone position... i kept my eyes as wide open as i could... i watched this floating red orb semi transparent that emits little light move in closer to my face... it was hovering in front of my nose... millimetres in front of my nose... i was studying it and i think it was studying me... it was a floating red orb semi transparent that emited little light it was millimetres from my nose... i think it touched me... next thing i remember it was day light... i wandered into the centre of camp... two others said they saw a ufo... the commanding officer said it was a helicopter forget about it... i don't know what they saw but i know what i saw... a floating red orb semi transparent that barely emited light... it was millimetres from my nose i think it touched me... this was the first time contact was made... for the record i didn't fall asleep imagine or dream this... at the time i thought it was some sort of test or secret weapon... whatever doesn't mater anymore... time was lost...
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Red orb under intelligent control touched my face... happened when i was in army...

content.detailedDescription:
Items have been disappearing for about 2 (two) years around me, and the places i occupy.  about 200 items have disappeared - the local police say they "don't deal with paranormal" but have filed a report (no investigation).
my father does not believe me and is in complete denial, but when this very first began, put up cameras that have an infrared feature but record constantly. the footage stays for 30 (thirty) days and is then replaced by the new footage. 

i was reviewing footage, since i had found strange things before - unexplained deleted footage, orbs, objects look different on camera, suddenly camera quality not good - and "randomly" picked a date and time, february 17, 2016 and time.

i started watching, and saw orbs - white in color, round - flying towards the right bottom corner of the screen.  about 1.5 seconds later, i saw [what i believed to be] me walking from my computer area across the bottom right corner of the screen into my bedroom. i didn't think i was home at this time, so i slowed the footage down to 1/16 of a second (i think) and replayed "myself" going into my room and back a couple of times.  suddenly i realized that "i" had my hair in braided pigtails.  i don't wear braided pigtails. then i realized that the apparition was walking through a closed bedroom door.

i was in shock as i looked on, and realized that the supposed "girl" wasn't wearing a detailed shirt, or anything i was wearing - it had been about 9 days since the 17 of february so i actually remembered.I have been having trouble with my memory.  i was excited to watch the footage because i always find something. two other times it has somehow become deleted and i was at least going to get a picture of the orbs. after viewing what i had seen, a human-like apparition that literally could have been my twin, i felt afraid - like whatever this entity is that has been harassing me for two years today, could make it appear like i was on camera, and it could be overlooked. 

i called my friend to come over and see the footage. i didn't touch the recorder or replay the incident, only took a picture with my iphone of the frame i paused on of the human-like apparition that looks just like me, but i was not home at the time. i pointed the differences between myself and the apparition to jeremy, but when i went to replay the 17th, the footage was gone. my friend checked everywhere, and was in shock because of what he had also witnessed. he just didn't see the orbs of light that seemed to have caused the apparition.
content.summary: 12-20 "orbs" white, dense, traveled fast made human-like entity in less than 2 secs on video footage

content.detailedDescription:
on my way to the tulsa car show from a friend's house, i glanced out of the passenger side window and noticed the flying object in the sky, thinking it was a plane. at least that is what i thought for the first two or three seconds until i noticed that it stopped approaching us and simply suspended mid movement an uncalculated distance, most likely a third of a mile, from where we sat at the red light. so  i stared at it, waiting for it to keep moving so that i could see the wings because i love watching planes fly, it didn't budge. and instead, it jumped three progressively faded movements into the thick cumulonimbus clouds threatening rain above us. 
it  had the appearance of a domed disc it with silver and chrome coloring, that is why i assumed it was a plane at first, thinking the wide rings around it were wings.
content.summary: On my way to the car show, i saw the disc shaped object hovering and zip up into heavy cloud cover.

content.detailedDescription: 9:23 pm sunday april 17, 2016 johns creek, ga. clear skies with 3/4 moon & 65 degree temperature. while walking my dogs in my front yard i noticed what appeared at first to be a very bright star at 340 degrees nnw about 40 degrees above the horizon but i didn’t remember a star anywhere near that bright in that part of the sky and it seemed like it was moving. as i continued to observe it i realized by comparing it to a star at about 325 degrees nnw that it was moving very slowly, a bright white light about 4 times bigger than the biggest celestial body in the sky (besides the moon) and about twice as bright and also appeared to be getting brighter. i thought it might be the space station since i could hear no sound from the object and it was too big and bright to be an airplane. observed it for a couple of minutes as it passed almost directly overhead until it was at about 100 degrees ese and about 40 degrees above the horizon where it began to rapidly diminish in brightness so that within about 5 seconds it disappeared completely. it was within an area of dim stars above the tree line and no clouds were visible anywhere in the sky. that surprised me as it could not have descended below the plane where the sun would reflect off of it unless it was much lower and (if an aircraft) should have been able to have been heard. i continued to observe the area where the object disappeared for 15 or 20 seconds to see if it would reappear or for any other sign of it, but i saw nothing else.
content.summary: Observed bright white light twice as big & bright as any other object except moon moving slowly from nw to se and dimmed over a 5-10 second time until it disappeared completely

content.detailedDescription: Saw a white object moving fast, it had a right blinking light on the bottom, no sound.
content.summary: Looked out window saw a white objece moving fast, with red pulsing light

content.detailedDescription: Sitting on the back porch facing west when i noticed a bright starlight object moving west to east. it took 30-35 seconds to appear on the horizon and head directly behind the moon then after it passed the moon and fell behind earths shadow it disappeared. pretty sure it was a very large asteroid moving at incredible speed it was big too the size of venus or mercury. heard no sound because if it was a aircraft it would have definately made a sonic boom and doubt it was a satelite because it was moving way too fast.
content.summary: Possible astroid

content.detailedDescription: Was sitting on back deck at 715pm. noticed a light in sky to east not moving. was neither star or airplane. through binoculars appeared to be a huge upright column of lights in the distance 35 degrees above horizon. stationary and hovered then drifted extremely slowly to the south east afyer 30 minutes.  took video on phone attached. neighbors and wife saw it. i thought maybe it was a weather balloon glistening in the sun but it didnt move at all for a long time.  when viewed through binoculars it looked light a huge tall sparkler.  never saw anything like it before.  sky was clear and no clouds in sky. eventually it disappeared in the distance.
content.summary: Noticed bright column of sparkling light. not moving. seemed to be glistening in sun. huge

content.detailedDescription:
I was in bed at 10pm and noticed a luminescent green triangle on the wall opposite, i then looked again ten minutes later and it was a rectangle, i looked again half an hour later and it was 2 sets of 2  green dots  parallel.These dots then combined with a large square of glyphs in grey and black 1mtr x 1mtre which just flashed up for 3-4 seconds.
i was puzzled but went back to sleep.
i do get car light shining through the curtains but this was green shapes.
content.summary: Green lghts luminous on wall shape changing in london

content.detailedDescription:
I saw a ufo just south of the corner of leach rd and bethany church road.  at approximately 8:45 - 9:00 pm on 29 march 2016, i was driving south on bethany church road and as i approached my turn onto leach road, i observed a large row of extremely bright rectangular windows hovering just a few hundred yards farther down bethany church road. the object seemed to be circular because the windows appeared to be wrapped horizontally around it.

the ufo was low enough to be partially hidden by the trees. it made no noise and was completely motionless.

i have a pilot’s license and i know the differences between types of aircraft. this object was definitely not an aircraft. it’s lights were too bright and it’s low altitude was way beneath faa minimums. it did not move in the time that i observed it and i would have stopped to take a photograph, but i became frightened and did not want a close encounter. next time, i’ll take the chance to get a photo. i lost sight of the object because of my driving away from the intersection. 

this was my second ufo sighting. my first was in the company of my older brother where we both observed a pair of ufos flying high on a clear, moonless night. they seemed to be following the magnetic lines of the earth as they traveled silently and with great speed. they were definitely saucer shaped and emitted a blue-green glow. this first encounter was in the first hours of july 5th. not sure of the year but i would guess 1955. location was auburn, new york.
content.summary: Large oval shaped disc with large dome. extremely white light emitted from row of windows.

content.detailedDescription:
1. my fiancé and i were on our balcony in downtown los angeles.
2. ever since we moved to our current location a year ago i have seen a number of strange things in the sky. first they were just bright star like circles moving all over the place to just really fast across the sky. the recent one that i am reporting was at first just a star/ circle i jest moving very fast. i pointed it out to my fiancé and he used his star guid app which told him it could just be expected space debris flying by but then sure enough another insanely big thing came into view. there had to be over 20 or more circle/ star like bright flying things that were attempting to fly in a perfect boomerang/ v formation. it was very big and hard to miss. it flew across our vantage point if the sky until going out of view behind a building. after that another single fast moving bright circle/ star like thing sped across the same area in the sky. then another fleet flew by in the same type of formation except this time it looked like a singular one was joining the group why fly across the sky sky we can see from our balcony to go out of sight behind the same building. 
3. we thought nothing other than amazement. it looked like something out of star wars. we did not try to get footage of the objects because by the time we could quantify what we were seeing the crafts were no longer in view. 
4. the objects were circular, looking like blue/white/ bright stars flying fast in formation going from east to north east. 
5. ever since moving to our current spot i have seen countless odd things in the sky but only from our balcony. most of the time i feel very oddly happy or not much at all. this time what we saw made me feel a tad worried. seeing two big fleets fly buy just did not feel innocent in nature to me which is why i thought i would report.
6. from our balcony we can only view a very small specific part of the sky so when we have seen ufos they either just disappear right in front of our eyes or go out of frame, meaning we lose sight of them because they fly past where we can see behind a building. the fleets we saw last night did just that. they flew across the part of the sky we can see until we lost visual as they went behind a building.
content.summary: Looked like a fleet of bright blue/white circles flyers in a boomerang/ v shap. you could clearly tell each circle was a separate entity because it did not stay in a perfect v shape the entire time. looked as if they were attempting to fly in unison

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was in my backyard and just started scanning the sky and seen a star like object that at the time was not moving, got my 50x camera and when i got back it was gone started scanning the sky and found it over 1 mile to the left, was able to track it as it moved all over the sky form right to left. i lost the unknown object as it became to far and high in the sky
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Star like object moving in sky

content.detailedDescription: We saw the silvery object which had to be several miles high move silently from se to nw.  it had a black edge to it and we did get two pics but of poor quality. there was jet in the same vicinity that gave us a rough frame of reference in regards to altitude. we were just sitting outside and i looked up because i heard the plane.  we live near the cmh airport'slanding pattern so we see lots of planes and this was no plane, just a silent metallic objects moving across the sky.
content.summary: We saw the silvery object which had to be several miles high move silently from se to nw.  it had a black edge to it and we did get two pics but of poor quality.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were driving north bound on hwy 137 between ozona and big lake tx.  we noticed these interesting cloud formations to our west. there was a thunderstorm approximately 20-30 miles ahead of us. in the cloud formation there was a gap of blue sky being slowly surrounded, and in the center was hovering a single white/bright oval object. as i showed my wife, the object disappeared. a few seconds later it reappeared still hovering as white line/cigar shaped object, then darted south behind a cloud. next it came out of the cloud with another white/bright line/cigar shaped object. both objects where heading south. the second object changed from cigar-shaped to circular. then another object appeared as a fireball or asteroid shaped object with a trail of flames. in an instant it stopped its path. at the same time the first object seemed to change into an oval shape. now all three objects appeared oval shaped. they stopped as if to communicate and the first and third object headed north/northwest. the second traveled south/southeast as it changed back into a line/cigar shape. it appeared to get larger and larger as if it was getting closer and closer to us. it's outline was fuzzy almost hazy and then it disappeared. the other two remained oval and then ducked behind the thunderstorm ahead. we noticed later that the gas gauge wasn't to empty and the check engine light was on. my wife stated that her face felt hot. we both felt excited and anxious. the experience was like nothing we've ever seen before. and we both feel like it was definitely something out of the norm.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Saw three unidentified flying objects in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: I'm not going to disclose my story on here.  i will only do this in person.  i have video and also pics.  i reported to the ufo hotline and wad basically shut down being told i didn't see anything and the pics i had on my pigging disappeared.  so what i have now is on several different  devices and i will only show them in person. i thought i was going crazy and it had taken others that have also seen what i have a photos to get me to submit this report. all i do know for sure is what is hovering in the sky's of lonedell mo nightlife is not anything that belongs to us. and i open my gate to any one who it's willing to investigate.
content.summary: I have been watching this take place every night for over 3 months several unidentified objects every night over this farm.

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 12:25am on april 17th, i let my dogs outside and decided to walk out on the back porch. i was watching my dogs in the yard when from the ne a huge reddish-orange light caught my attention. it looked like a large single round brake light wafting through the sky. it was a quiet night, no wind of any kind, yet this large object remained completely silent. the object never blinked or changed in intensity.

i really thought it was a meteor initially until i noticed it didn't have a tail and was moving in a straight line toward the sw at about 45 degrees above the horizon. it was about the height a helicopter would fly and roughly about the speed. it was then that i noticed a second object that i would describe exactly the same as the first object. it had the same appearance, the same speed, size and luminosity. it originated from the same area of the sky and was the same altitude. the second object was following the first object in what looked to be a direct line. 

i happened to have my smartphone in my pocket so i grabbed it and began fumbling around to turn on the video recorder. i shot about 24 seconds worth of video. the objects both remained constant in intensity but there were many tree limbs between me and the objects. the first object was nearly out of site when i began recording. it was only in the recording for approximately 3 seconds. i continued to record the second object until it too was out of site. i was in a residential area with many trees and rooftops and only a small window of this area of the sky. both objects basically disappeared behind rooftops. the entire sighting lasted about 50 seconds.
content.summary: Observed two reddish-orange orbs moving in straight line from the ne to sw. they were both silent. both seemed 50% larger than a normal helicopter

content.detailedDescription:
1. at home
2. using telescope to video moon. noticed after reviewing video
3. spacecraft
4. object moved from right to left in front of our moon
5. wasn't really sure what to think
6. out of telescope frame
content.summary: Moon flyby

content.detailedDescription: I noticed that the clouds were quite spectacular looking, and wanted pictures. i take lots of pictures of the sky and clouds. i went out on the back steps and took the pictures. i went in my home, to the computer, and downloaded them. i was amazed at what i saw, because i had these white glowing images on the pictures that i didn't see with my own eyes. please can you tell me what they could be? one picture has an orb and wonder about that too. i took the pictures right around sunset, and was facing directly to the west. the air was very charged, and my hair seemed to want to stand up, and i got the goosebumps.
content.summary: I didn't see the objects in the pictures with my eyes, until i downloaded into my computer, and looked at them. i don't really understand that, and wonder what you can tell me about what they are.

content.detailedDescription: I had just returned home at around 1 am from celebrating a relative's 90th birthday. as i usually do when returning home late at night, i took a look at the sky above me. i was observing the moon looking towards the west. i shifted my focus to its left, where my neighborhood has no street lamps and i usually see the brightest and most numerous stars. i noticed a bright star, moving quickly near the moon, which was apparently at 21.1 degrees above the horizon at that time. the star was therefore probably at around 19-20 degrees. i had noticed this star at first moving in a southwesterly direction, away from the moon and towards the previously mentioned star patch which was to the left of the moon. the fact that there was a bright star moving in a single direction didn't bother me; i assumed it was simply a satellite especially since it was exhibiting a constant flashing sequence, unlike other stars. i ruled out it being a plane because of its speed relative to the apparent distance of the object from the ground, much too slow for a plane, very plausible for a satellite. moreover, while it was flashing, as planes do, there were no indications of red light that characterizes plane flashing and it was flashing at a much faster frequency than a plane, which flashes ever few seconds. this object seemed to be flashing constantly, with no intervals between flashes. now at some point, the star was about to cross over the sky above my neighbour's house across the street and over the street to its right side. at that point, it stopped. what had appeared to be a satellite flying at extremely fast speeds simply stopped mid-air with absolutely no slowing of speed beforehand. it remained this way for about five seconds and then proceeded to start moving in the opposite direction from where it came from, in a northwesterly direction. throughout this entire time, my family had been slowly and reluctantly getting out of the car after having fallen asleep in it. my mom was arguing with my whiny ten year old brother for him to get out. my heart rate at this point had no doubt started to climb, and i alerted my mom, telling her that this star had just changed direction and asking her if it was a satellite. however, she was preoccupied with my brother. she finally managed to get him out of the car and went inside the house with him and the rest of my family, leaving me alone standing in my driveway at that point. i continued to observe the star as it crossed the sky under the moon. as it crossed under the moon, which was above the left side neighbour of the house across the street i have mentioned (i will include a picture of this setting below) i became once more conscious of how bright the object was, as it was now crossing sky above a part of my neighbourhood with street lamps where most stars are drowned out. i even considered the possibility of it being a small meteor for a bit, however that seemed unreasonable; nothing could explain the hovering and direction shift. at this point i was feeling intense emotion, overwhelmed and the tightness in one's chest during tense moments. i heard my mom call out my name from the front door, asking me if i was coming in because she wanted to lock the door and yelling out that it's not a ufo. i mumbled some incoherent response, not really answering her question seeing as the object was now entering the sky behind the pine tree in my right side neighbour's front yard and not wanting to lose track of it. i noticed at this point that it must've been getting farther and farther away seeing that its brightness was slowly diminishing and it was slowly reduced to the size of a regular star, all the while, however, still flashing. i saw that it was to reach the tree line soon and was also nearing the neighbour's house. it was reduced to a flicker as it crept behind the house and i lost sight of it at last. i was feeling wide awake and alert, so i tried going through the gate to my backyard to see whether it would reappear on the other side of the house but i knew it was no use and resigned myself to going inside. this ended my experience and i began wondering how on earth i was supposed to go to sleep after that. the photos i will include below do not all include the object in question. i will include a photo i took 5 minutes after the one including the star (which was bright enough to be actually visible to my iphone camera contrary to most stars). the photo shows the setting i have described in detail here, with the house across the street, the house next to it on it's right, and the moon. the star visible in this photo is not the star in question but simply another bright star. the other photo i will include is directly to my right, above the street that separates the two houses across the street and the neighbour with the pine tree and where the object disappeared behind. the star is visible yet faint, so i have circled it out.
content.summary: Star-like, constant flashing. was flying in sw direction, stopped, started flying ne

content.detailedDescription: At an outdoor bbq and was noticing how beautiful the night sky appeared when i and another gentleman noticed a very bright light that was moving from west to east in a straight line pattern. speed is unknown, but i have been around military aircraft and know for sure that it was going faster than anything that i have ever noticed. no sonic boom was noticed.Tried to get other people to notice but it happened so fast they did not see it.Unsure of height of object though it appeared to be flying about the same altitude of a commercial plane.
content.summary: Glowing ufo

content.detailedDescription:
This was my first siting (5 more as the years went by). i was almost 7 at the time and we had spent the day in ridgewood nj house hunting. my father was going to start work in ny city as sr. engineer building 222 broadway (the building is still there today). we were driving home to utica, ny and going north on the ny turnpike. i had fallen asleep in the back of the station wagon and it was late in the afternoon. i remember the sun in my eyes as i was trying to sleep. i heard my parents talking and you know when your young that you know something is wrong when you hear the tone of their conversation. i picked my head up and asked what was wrong. my father told me to go back to sleep. of course i did the opposite. i looked up front. my brother was asleep but my sister and mother were looking out the passenger side windows. i moved over to the window and when i looked out i saw a silver disc just above the trees following along the side of the car. it was silver/reflective and was about the size of a golf ball off to the east. i state the direction since the sun was on the other side of the car in the late afternoon and had not set yet. i remember saying something like it was neat at which my mother got mad at me an said there was nothing neat about it. she said she had told my father to get off the highway and go to a police station. my father stated that he had no plans to pull over and stop at a police station. if he did what would he say. they would think i was drunk of out of my mind. i asked how long has it been following us. my mother said too long but my sister said about 15 minutes. i said wow and was told to shut up by both my parents. as i looked out at the disc it seemed smaller. at that point it did not go higher, it just pulled away. about 10 seconds later it was gone. no one talked about the rest of the way home.
the next morning at breakfast i said i could not wait for show and tell at school to tell everyone what happened. to my surprise my parents told me i should not talk about it and as far as they were concerned it was just some new type of airplane.  even at almost 7 years old i was already into planes ( i eventually became a pilot) and was putting together model planes. this object had no wings no propeller or jet engine. well i told my story at school and was laughed at and my teacher told me i had a good imagination. 
as i said this was my first siting with more as the years went by.
content.summary: Silver disc

content.detailedDescription:
I went outside, after getting a telepathic communication asking if i wanted to see "them".  so, i decided that i would go outside and look up in the usual place in the sky.  at first i saw a green meteor like object zipping in a south-west direction.  this led my eyes to what looked like a triangular constellation.  the three star-like points of light then rotated around a second or two, but keeping the original triangular shape.  after that, they left formation, one flew closer to the other, but then all 3 went off in different directions. 

i see ufos at least on a monthly basis and often weekly, or twice a week, and the other most recent sighting was of an object that was not more than 500ft above the ground and spinning off what i guess to be plasma, which arced away from the craft like a solar flare; this sighting was about a week ago.  i also get telepathic communications with humans and ets very frequently. you can tell for sure when they're for-sure humans when they're very rude, while the ets are polite and friendly. often, i will be asked before seeing a ufo if i would like to see one outside, usually very late at night.  please note that the image i uploaded was from one of my first ufo sightings, not this most recent one, and was taken with an older digital camera... this picture was taken around about the time that i got interested in reading about cold fusion, and trying to spread the word about it.

if you would like, you might be able to set up instruments to see what you can find out about them.  i definitely have an implant for telepathic communications, and there are some childhood memories of mine that might point to alien contact when i was young.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 3 hovering white lights in triangular formation which then rotated and left in different directions

content.detailedDescription: Thought i was seeing a shooting star and then it started going back and forth and sideways, looked too high to be a drone.
content.summary: Saw light wobbling in the sky

content.detailedDescription: I went out side to smoke a cigarette and i looked up to see if i can see anything and that's when i saw a strange light moving in a strange way. it movied in a strat line and then it would stop for about a minute or two and then it would move a little faster and it would slow down and then it just vanish.So i nocked on my son's window and he came out.This is the second time my son and saw it this year.The first time it was in feb.
content.summary: It was moving in a strat line and stop and move again.

content.detailedDescription: It was around 1978 in louisvill   i was 15 going over my girlfriends house i was waiting to cross the street and i happen to look up at the sky and it was the coolest thing but scary at the same time it look like a bright star with a trail of colorful lights at the end of it not making a sound going a cross the sky horizontal i kept staring tell it was out of my sight
content.summary: Bright star like with long tail of lights differnt colors

content.detailedDescription: 8:50 p.M. my son and i walked outside and saw orange/white orb north, north east around speedway and harrison. it was floating about 500 ft above sea level then ascended at a slow but steady rate straight up. i could only see it till it was about satellite elevation then i looked away at a close by star too see if anything else was around then saw a dim white flash. at the time of the incident near by dogs were barking and whining not sure if related and that was the end of this sighting.Tried getting video or photo footage but too dark for cell phone to pick up
content.summary: Orange orb leaving earth

content.detailedDescription: Well, about 9:30pm on april 16, 2016, i went out to get something from my car and i started crossing rt 11 which intersects my property , and i saw a small flash in the sky that was red. i went to my house and got a pair of binoculars and went back outside and crossed the street to the driveway of my garage and faced to the west- i used my phone app and saw that the object was approximately 250 degrees west in the sky. once i located it with my binoculars i could see that it was flashing red, blue, and green lights inside an area of white light. it basically hovered- i saw a red light from a plane pass nearby and it helped to show that the object must have been large but how large i don't know. decided to go and get my son's telescope and after having a little difficulty locating it, i had a good view of a sphere shaped object that was flashing red , blue , and green on the inside. i watched it for about an hour and then it vanished from my sight about 11:00pm. i took a picture and a video with my iphone, but they didn't show what i actually saw.
content.summary: Object flashing red, green , and blue lights seen in the western sky at around 10:00 pm on april 16, 2016

content.detailedDescription: I was driving down 309 south when i saw two red-orange lights out the right-side window. at first, i thought the objects were aircraft, but they were not blinking and didn't seem to be moving. i thought maybe they were stars too, but they seemed way too bright and way to red-orange to be stars. i also thought they might be lights on a tower of some sort, but i think they were too high to be that either. the sighting didn't last long, maybe a few minutes or so, because i drove past where i could no longer see it because it was obscurred by the trees. i really don't know what it was, again, best guess it might have been a tower or something, but it just doesn't add up.
content.summary: 2 red-orange bright star-like lights

content.detailedDescription: At about 9:30 pm cst i went out my front door to smoke a cigarette. as i was lighting up i noticed a bright light to the north west. it went behind some trees from my observation point. then continued on its path south south east. it grew brighter for about 3 seconds then appeared to ascend and grew dimmer. i finished my smoke and went inside to look at radar contacts on the internet,and saw there was no aircraft in the area observed going in the direction i saw the light headed. then checked for satellites that may have been in the area. also no hits.
content.summary: Bright light got my attention looked like aircraft but no sound and no red/green lights got brighter then it acended and grew dimmer.

content.detailedDescription: I was a passenger sat in the front of mpv , i was taking pictures of my surroundings , i noticed something glittering in the sky , but i did not think much of it  until i uploaded the picture.
content.summary: On a day trip in the atlas mountains saw a triangle in the sky
